item.title: Beyblade X: XONE now available worldwide
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/11/beyblade-x-xone-now-available-worldwide

  • PC
  • Switch

A surprise global release.

Beyblade action game Beyblade X: XONE is now available for Switch via Nintendo eShop and PC via Steam for $49.99 worldwide, publisher FuRyu and developer Groove Box Japan announced. It supports English and Japanese language options

Beyblade X: XONE was previously announced to be releasing for Switch and PC in Japan today, but its global release with English language support was a surprise launch.

Here is an overview of the game, via FuRyu:

About

Experience action-packed Beyblade battles in a stadium equipped with Beyblade X‘s signature X-celerator Rail as you unleash the Xtreme Dash and use the game’s original “Active Gauge” to execute exciting tactical maneuvers!

Story

A Tournament to determine the true No. 1 takes place at The X, the most coveted location for all Bladers. This is The X Championship. Both professionals and amateurs can enter this Tournament. The protagonist (you) receives the “KNIFE SHINOBI” from your father and decides to enter the Tournament… Waiting at The X are powerful Bladers aiming for the top! Jaxon, Robin, Multi, and new rivals stand in your way! At the summit waits Khrome Ryugu, from the overwhelmingly powerful team “Pendragon”! Win intense Battle and aim for the top of The X!

Key Features

  • Story – A completely new story featuring original game characters! A new tournament, The X Championship, is being held at The X. Compete with rivals, deepen bonds, and aim for the top of The X!
  • Battle – Completely recreates the ultra-accelerated battles of Beyblade X! Feel the impact of extreme acceleration in a stadium equipped with the X-celerator Rail. When you “Let it rip!,” the “Active Gauge” fills over time. Use it to unleash critical “Attacks” and “Counters” one after another! Unleashing critical attacks increases the X Gauge! When it reaches MAX, choose the skill you want to activate. Skills operate on a rock-paper-scissors system. Choose a skill that gives you an advantage over your opponent!
  • Customize – Customization takes Xtreme Skill into account and offers over 100 million possible combinations! Freely combine parts and skills to set up your Beys just the way you want.
  • Online Battle – In Online Battle, you can compete against Bladers from all corners of the globe anytime, anywhere! Challenge Bladers from around the world and aim for the top.

Downloadable Content

The download contents “Digital Beybooster Vol.1,” available starting today, includes three additional Beys that recently appeared in the anime: “RUDDER PHOENIX 9-70G,” “CREST LEON 7-60GN,” and “TIDE WHALE 5-80E.” More new Beys are scheduled to be released in the future. Please stay tuned for updates from our official channels in the future.

The English version for Nintendo Switch includes a Season Pass by default, allowing players to obtain all the latest Beys up to Vol.3. Additionally, in the Steam version, Vol.1 is currently available for individual purchase.

item.title: Riviera: The Promised Land remaster for Switch coming west on November 28
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/11/riviera-the-promised-land-remaster-for-switch-coming-west-on-november-28

  • Switch

Pre-orders now available at 15 percent-off discount price.

Sting will release the Switch version of the remastered Riviera: The Promised Land via Nintendo eShop on November 28 worldwide for $34.99. Pre-orders are available now via Nintendo eShop at 15 percent-off discount price of $29.74.

The remastered Riviera: The Promised Land first launched for Switch on February 28 in Japan, followed by iOS and Android on May 29. A PC version launched via Steam on July 17 worldwide.

Here is an overview of the game, via Nintendo eShop:

About

You can enjoy the remastered version of Riviera: The Promised Land, the first work in the Dept. Heaven Episodes series, on Nintendo Switch!

Equipped with various additional convenient functions, the ease of play has been upgraded!

Full of elements that will satisfy everyone from first-time players to experienced players!

Story

At the behest of Hector, who is one of the Seven Magi, the Grim Angel Ein and his familiar, Rose, along with another Grim Angel named Ledah, all head to Riviera, an island floating in Asgard.

On the way, Ursula, the guardian of the Riviera, appears and is thwarted by the Grim Angels’ intrusion.

Ein, whose memories were sealed by Ursula’s attack, wakes up in Elendia, where the spirits live…

Key Features

  • Easy-to-operate field exploration!
  • A unique battle system where your skills are determined by the items you own!
  • Who are your close comrades? A favorability system that changes depending on your choices!
  • More than 90 illustrations to liven up events!

Remastered Additional Elements

  • Background music change function with five types of sound sources!
  • Play mode with up to 5x speed!
  • Event skip function!
  • All illustrations are available in high-definition!
  • Reliable auto save function!
  • Ease of play greatly improved by difficulty level and mode selection!
  • Boost function that allows you to quickly learn skills!
  • Improved user-friendly interface!
  • Function to switch voices between Japanese and English!

item.title: GREE establishes GREE Studios to manage consumer games business; live service games business absorbed by WFS
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/11/gree-establishes-gree-studios-to-manage-consumer-games-business-live-service-games-business-absorbed-by-wfs

New company structure to take effect on January 1, 2025.

GREE has announced the establishment of GREE Studios, a new subsidiary responsible for its consumer (console and PC) games business, previously managed by both WFS and Pokelabo. Additionally, GREE’s live service games business will be absorbed by WFS, with Pokelabo continuing as a brand under WFS.

The following company changes will take effect on January 1, 2025:

  • Pokelabo’s live service games business will be absorbed by WFS, with Pokelabo continuing to operate as a brand under WFS.
  • WFS and Pokelabo’s consumer games business will be transferred to the newly established GREE Studios, which will focus on strengthening GREE’s presence in the consumer games market.
  • GREE Entertainment‘s contract work will be absorbed by WFS, while GREE Entertainment will continue to focus on intellectual property production and game licensing.
  • GREE, Inc. will change its name to GREE Holdings, Inc. as it transitions to a holding company structure.

item.title: Strinova launches November 21 for PC, in 2025 for PS5, Xbox Series, iOS, and Android
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/11/strinova-launches-november-21-for-pc-in-2025-for-ps5-xbox-series-ios-and-android

  • PC
  • PS5
  • Smartphone
  • Xbox Series

Free-to-play anime-style fast-paced action shooter dated.

Free-to-play anime-style fast-paced action shooter Strinova will launch for PC via Steam, Epic Games Store, and client download on November 21, with pre-load beginning November 18, developer iDreamSky announced. PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, iOS, and Android versions will follow in 2025.

Here is an overview of the game, via iDreamSky:

About

At launch, Strinova will feature five game modes, 14 maps, and 15 playable Superstrings. More characters, maps, and game modes will be gradually introduced through new seasons and tournaments in the near future! Fans may want to keep a close eye on Strinova‘s website and socials for more information closer to launch!

Humanity is experiencing a new golden age after migrating to a strange multi-dimensional realm known as “Strinova.” Powerful factions with conflicting ideologies soon emerged, battling for the energy crystals that would allow them to ultimately decide the fate of the realm. Choose unique superstrings from P.U.S. (The Defender), The Scissors (The Attacker), and Urbino (Neutral) conquer the battlefield for the fate of Strinova. Which side will you choose?

Stringification (or “Stringify”) empowers players to seamlessly transition between 3D and 2D forms, fundamentally altering the way they play the game. By shifting into paper, players perform a multitude of maneuvers like dodging enemy fire, scaling vertical surfaces, uncovering hidden paths, and swiftly gliding across the map.

Key Features

  • Multi-Dimensional Shooter Experience – In the multi-dimensional world of Strinova, seamlessly switch between 2D and 3D forms to explore different movement routes and combat strategies, delivering a unique shooting experience.
  • Advanced Tactical Warfare – Strinova features multilayered maps, stringification mechanism, tactical skill operations, and a variety of usable devices, forming a unique team combat system.
  • Ever-Increasing Maps and Game Modes – Various maps bring numerous game modes, including Demolition and Team Deathmatch. More maps and game modes will be added in the future. Anticipate fighting alongside your teammates!
  • Unique Superstrings – Their unique skills and firearms make every Superstring irreplaceable. Whether you are an attacker breaking through enemy lines or a guardian protecting your teammates, you will find your place to shine.

Launch Details

Strinova will be available for pre-download beginning on November 18 at 4:00 p.m. PT / 7:00 p.m. ET from the official website and Steam. Servers will open at 4:00 p.m. PT / 7:00 p.m. ET on November 21! (Please note that while Strinova is currently only available on PC and Steam, Strinova will also be available on iOS, Android, PlayStation 5, and Xbox Series platforms in 2025.)

New Player Benefits: Pre-Registration Rewards

Eager players can sign up to pre-register for the game right now on Strinova‘s official website to earn special rewards by reaching specific community milestones. These rewards will be unlocked and available to players at launch!

Pre-registration rewards include:

  • 200,000 Unlock – OBT Commemorative Baseplate, OBT Audio Spray – Animated
  • 500,000 Unlock – 2000 Dream Token, 500 Basestring
  • 1,000,000 Unlock – Perfect Quality Kakona-Rockin’ Duck
  • 3,000,000 Unlock – 10 Memory Sequences
  • 6,000,000 Unlock – Perfect Quality Kokona’s Quasar – Tidal Duck

item.title: MONGIL: STAR DIVE adds console version, first details and screenshots
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/11/mongil-star-dive-adds-console-version-first-details-and-screenshots

Action RPG MONGIL: STAR DIVE will be available for console alongside its previously announced PC, iOS, and Android versions, publisher Netmarble and developer Netmarble Monster announced. The company also released the first information and screenshots for the game, which is currently playable at G-Star 2024, which runs from November 14 to 17 at Busan Exhibition & Convention Center in Busan, South Korea.

Get the details below.

■ About the Game

  • Title: MONGIL: STAR DIVE
  • Genre: Action RPG
  • Platform: PC / Console / Mobile
  • Developer: Netmarble Monster
  • Publisher: Netmarble
  • Game Engine: Unreal Engine 5

MONGIL: STAR DIVE is an action RPG that inherits Monster Taming, a game released in 2013 that marked the beginning of Netmarble’s journey in the mobile RPGs. Monster Taming was beloved by approximately 15 million users over a decade of service, and MONGIL: STAR DIVE aims to carry forward Monster Taming‘s diverse characters, unique universe, and core gameplay elements. The game is now under development to be playable across multiple platforms, including PC and consoles.

Monster Taming, an RPG That Received Nationwide Love, Returns with High-Quality Graphics

MONGIL: STAR DIVE follows the lively journey of protagonists Verna and Cloud. Players can enjoy the unique narrative as they undertake various guild missions alongside Cloud and Verna, who each have a special destiny. Throughout these missions, players can explore the game’s distinctive universe and encounter charming Adventurers, adding to the thrill of the adventure.

—Verna and Cloud are the protagonists of MONGIL: STAR DIVE.

—MONGIL: STAR DIVE’s mascot, Nyanners, will accompany players during their journey.

Players can also experience cutscenes and battles rendered in stunning 3D graphics powered by Unreal Engine 5, which enhances a sense of immersion while playing.

At G-Star 2024, MONGIL: STAR DIVE will showcase a high-quality “Story Mode” that allows players to dive into its rich universe. Participants in the demo can receive various game merchandise and a variety of prizes just through special G-Star events.

Taming Monsters

Players can tame Monsters using the abilities of Nyanners, the game’s mascot character shrouded in mystery. Tamed Monsters will receive special powers, which can be used strategically in battles or crafted into ‘Monster-ring’ that players can equip on and customize their characters.

—MONGIL: STAR DIVE’s protagonist Cloud and the new mascot Nyanners.

—“Monster-ring” that can receive special powers.

In addition, players can collect various Monsters through the use and synthesis of tamed Monsters and gather Monster-rings with different looks, adding to the excitement of discovering unique Monsters. More contents are now in development to allow players to utilize their tamed Monsters in various ways.

■ G-Star 2024 Demo Build Introduction

Story Mode Embodying the Journey of Verna and Cloud

At G-Star 2024, the “Story Mode” that offers a glimpse into the original universe of MONGIL: STAR DIVE will be unveiled. The story begins with Cloud and Verna—the main protagonists of the previous title Monster Taming—embarking on a new adventure with the game’s mascot Nyanners. Players can enjoy high-quality cutscenes and experience the game’s narrative, which will feel as if players are watching an animated film.

—MONGIL: STAR DIVE’s original universe depicts the journey of Verna, Cloud and Nyanners.

—The game’s Story Mode unfolds the comical and fun-filled adventures of MONGIL: STAR DIVE.

In the G-STAR demo build, players will encounter a variety of unique characters, including the protagonists Verna, Cloud and Mina. These characters will undertake various missions assigned by the guild and work together with different ‘characters’ with their own backstory to investigate the ecosystem of Monsters that has altered for unknown reasons.

—Discover more about the enigmatic girl and the mysterious crack that have appeared in Cloud’s dream in-game.

Verna is a character with high pride and a strong drive who takes a leading role in resolving the incidents she encounters throughout the story. Cloud, on the other hand, is a goofy character with an unmatched curiosity about Monsters and a pure-hearted personality, and he always manages to lighten the mood around him.

In addition to Verna, Cloud and Mina, players will also get to see fresh takes on popular characters from Monster Taming, such as Francis and Rin.

—A cutscene from MONGIL: STAR DIVE, featuring a variety of unique characters.

Thrilling Tag Play with Three-Character Party and Dynamic, Fancy Action Sequence

In MONGIL: STAR DIVE, players can enjoy combat content using a party of three characters. Players will combine the unique attributes and skills of each character to engage in strategic battles tailored to their party composition.

Battles in MONGIL: STAR DIVE focuses on “simple action,” allowing players to enjoy exhilarating and dynamic battles with easy controls. Players can form their party based on character traits and experience spectacular action sequences through tag play.

—A battle scene from MONGIL: STAR DIVE: Each character can use its own unique, spectacular ultimate skill.

—Characters encountering the giant boss Custos.

—Characters within the party can engage in cooperative combat, and they can activate special skills, such as ‘Bind’, depending on the boss they’re challenging.

If you missed it, watch the G-Star 2024 trailer here. View the screenshots at the gallery.
